summary: Delivery Director with 20+ years experience in project delivery. Team player, analytical, strong planning & control capabilities, accurate & reliable, responsible and result oriented.

profile_positions.description:
Customer Success Team Leadership 
•	Establishing Backbase's Delivery Operations in US and Canada.  
•	Managing all North America (US & Canada) based Customers Accounts 
•	Working with the customer to ensure ongoing support and identify new opportunities to drive continued business and IT value.  
•	Identify quick wins and long term opportunities to help drive operational value.  
Cross Department Delivery  
•	Responsible for the delivery of the customer portfolio - projects from various departments within and range from implementation projects, consultancy projects, product development to training.   
•	Process; providing delivery best practice insights and advice  
•	Escalation on program delivery before Executive Management.  
•	Steering and monitoring all the projects, step in when needed, focus on  enabling the teams to execute at full efficiency.  
•	Empower people to make decisions and operate at a level that will ensure success for the customer 
Strategy & Relationship management  
•	Understanding clients digital strategy, the plan in place to implement the strategy, progress against that plan, 
•	Driving the relationship with key delivery stakeholders at the client, ongoing alignment throughout the engagement with the client  
•	Helping to create and maintain the right culture and working environment; create a culture of excellence and continuous improvement.  
•	Tactical stakeholder management with the tier one System Integrator that is involved with  the customer.
profile_positions.title: Delivery Director - US & Canada

profile_positions.description:
•	Management of Customer Success Programs – providing an overall solution to the customer and successful implementation by Project Managers
•	Manage and contract implementation partners and boutique partners to support them in their Backbase implementation
•	Internal alignment between R&D and Professional Services to remove potential dependencies between the projects and product development.
•	Stakeholder management and expectation management within the Backbase organization, and customers.
profile_positions.title: Delivery Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Operations Manager & Tribe Lead for Professional Services Tribe (60+ consultants) 
•	Leader of a Projects Tribe – 8 squads running scrum projects simultaneously making sure the consultants have the right set of skills 
•	Continuous Optimization for all operational activities in the tribe (Resources allocation, consultants right mix, training
•	Recruitment, Partner & contract Management, Resource Allocation, KPI Monitoring, on- & off-boarding process 
•	Responsible for the growth of the Tribe with internal consultants and near-shore partners
•	Portfolio Management: project and capacity planning, strategy and staffing
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager & Tribe Leader

profile_positions.description:
•	Project Manager – Managing Omni channel (desktop/tablet/mobile app) Websites/Webportals development. 
•	Manage Software Development Process & team (20 FTEs) – Agile/Scrum based project management of development of mobile websites, projects budgets of around €1m -€2m.
•	Project Management control: budget, resources, planning, estimations, risks, processes, procedures, documents.
•	Off shore Teams Management – Management of partners & teams in East Europe.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Program Manager - Manages the daily activities of mobile web Development Company. Websites development for mobile devices, operations in 25 countries with 70 mobile operators. Manager of a Front and Back End developers teams of 6 FTEs. 
•	Project Manager – Managing Websites development. Manage Software Development Process & team (6 FTEs) – Prince2 Method based project management of development of mobile websites, projects budgets of around 50k.
•	Project Management improvement & control (budget, resources, planning, estimations, risks) - Prince2 setting up the whole project infrastructure for the organization, including all processes, procedures, documents.
•	Partners Management – Management of all delivery partners in 25 countries.
profile_positions.title: Project & Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Project Manager – Managing home energy management products development up to delivery to the customer. Manage Software Development Process & team - SCRUM 
•	Program Management – Responsibility for international accounts (Intel, Vodafone) 
•	Project management improvement & control (budget, resources, planning, estimations, risks) - Prince2
•	Customer Management – Management of customer expectations, requirements, change, support
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Project manager of software & hardware development  (Traffic Info. Sys.) and installation projects (€0.5M – €1.5M)
•	Manage Software development process & teams in India, Germany (prince 2)
•	Manage Hardware production & Installation team in The Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Software development Project/Program Manager (PMP) –projects budget varies between $400k to $30M. Projects duration: 3 months to 1.5 year, between 3 to 8 team members (under a Project Leader supervision). Agile Project Management methods such as SCRUM were also used. 
•	Integration-, Budget-, Scope-, Resource-, Project Plans-, Time-, Quality-, Reports- & Risk Management.   
•	Integration & structure between product management, business development & software development
•	Process Improvement, efficiency, & project management tool implementation & consultancy (PMBoK).
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Project/Program Management of an international outsourcing project (using ITIL/ITSM methodologies). A $30M project of an international customer, located in 30 sites in 15 countries. 9 different sub-projects supervised by a technical project leader, total team size around  20 members.
•	Set-up, Implementation, Internal control & management of all project activities processes, policies & procedures (HP Global Method).
•	Generation of status reports & updates to the project steering committee (MS Project & Excel)
profile_positions.title: Project Management Officer

profile_positions.description:
•	Management of all Web activities & requirements definition of the bank. A €4M project, 2 years long, around. 12 team members (intern & extern)
•	On-Line Private Banking project coordinator – design-, development-, content-, financial reports-, organizational portal -teams.
•	Business Information Systems manager/analyst (CRM, Content Management, Financial Information Systems, ERP).
profile_positions.title: Project Leader
